Thanks for the torrent!

yes or use a tool to put it on a usb stick.

can this be used as a primary os? i want to replace my mandriva with it.

yes

can i use it on a 4 year old laptop?

yes
another question: what do i do if during setup it says it cannot detect a hard disk???
check the install additional drivers box

Great torrent thanks bro!...

i can see the iso file listed as:
"WINDOWS FUNDAMENTALS INSTALLATION ISO (ORIGINAL)."

i see the sp3 file.  the only other file is the 'winflp' file that is winrar file?

i am confused as to what i should be doing.
i actually want to install this on hard drive.  how do i do that after i copy what i need to (from my first question above)?
the winflp is the WINDOWS FUNDAMENTALS INSTALLATION ISO use active iso (included) to burn it to a cd at the slowest possable speed

ok, i got that step done.  thanks

now when i boot my computer off the cd, it just goes to a dos window.....how do i get it to install the windows xp on to the harddrive on my computer?
what does the dos window say?, are you sure you are booting from the cd as that sounds like you have the cd in the drive then you turn the pc on and it goes to your harddrive

Hi there. Installed this on a Fujitsu Siemens laptop and tried to connect to internet via Tele2 mobile internet modem. It did not work and it appears that it was a problem with 1394 net adapter. Any ideas on how to solve this? cheers
did you install the networking components when you ran setup?

I must admit I don't know. I believe I did everything correct, but when asked for IP addresses, I skipped that because I didn't not know what the ip address was.
When installing, I burned the big iso file to a disk and then ran it. Afterwards I burned the update files to a disk and ran it. Everything but the internet connection seems to be working fine.

Maybe I should try installing everything once again before I do anything else? What do I do when asked for IP addresses? cheers
well it could be as simple as not having thedriver installed for your network card, by default all Lan connections will work
Ok. I will try to install it again and see what happens. Thank you very much for your reply. cheers
Please help how do i set up my wireless lan i have a Acer Aspire 3650 netbook
ChaosHellbound, download the driver from the acer website

Once I boot from CD drive and installation begins , a dos window opens saying " X:\setup " and then nothing happens.
Thanks thethingy for the great torrents.

(i dont comment often) i just want to say i think its great that thethingy actually spends the time to help troubleshoot a lot of these individuals problems himself... everything from the foolish questions to the more in depth ones... i haven't come across that often... usually its just childish banter about weather or not a torrent contains a trogan or virus... so kudos to thethingy even without mentioning that his uploads i've downloaded have been great...

thanks m8 love this tiny pc 
great job yet again :)

Holy fucking shit.  This is amazing.

I had to manually extract the directx files from the cabs to get that working, but after that I have a slick little gaming OS.

I was also able to turn off a load of services and the OS booted up at under 190 MB of RAM used (with some minor tools loaded).  It settled down to about 250 after some time.  I'd bet I could cut that down if I had more RAM and disabled the paging file.

Runs Ventrilo better than XP (fixes my volume issue) and runs World of Warcraft well.

This asked me for a crapload of updates, which downloaded and installed fine.  That includes sp3.

sp3 never did get downloaded and installed and it's still offered as an option but silently does nothing.  I'll install the sp3 file that's included with this torrent.


Thank you SO much for this, thethingy, it's fantastic.
Oh, and yes I was able to get my standard XP drivers working.  I had some odd blue screen issues and hard reboots at one point but it all worked out in the end.
I'm having some odd memory issues.  I'll manually enlarge my swap file.  It seems the automatic settings aren't effective.
